summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 7775, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Elliott Avenue, from Broad Street to Bell Street, in the City of Seattle, by regrading, replanking and residewalking the same, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said City, approved December 6, 1899.
